title: 神秘时代4 4.0.5为什么用不了
author: cxw123903
txt_content:
forge mod loader has found a problem with your minecraft installation the mods and versions listed below could not be found
Forge:minimum version required in 9.11.1.953
the file `forgemodloader-client-0.log`contains more informatiom
怎么回事啊{:10_494:}

replies.author: wish2012
replies.txt_content: forge版本太低，最低要求953版本

replies.author: 雪狼湖
replies.txt_content: 我也是这个问题，可是我的Forge没法跟新到953啊
